docs.title: Welcome to Note
docs.text: Hi! Here are my notes. These notes are written in Markdown, with LaTeX embedded, and the site is generated using MkDocs. All content on this site is licensed under CC BY-NC-SA 4.0.

docs.title: Privacy
docs.text:
• This website is hosted on GitHub Pages, a static site hosting service. While GitHub Pages does collect IP addresses, I do not have access to this information.
  • There are several third party plugins enabled in this site.
  • There's no cookies enabled in this site. If you have any other concerns, feel free to review the source code on GitHub.

docs.title: To Developers
docs.text: Edit this site on the server, then use ‘mkdocs build’ to generate the website. Then deploy it to Github Pages. NEVER edite the source code on Github, cause your work won't be saved.
